TopicTitle: Steam Community Hub has lost a lot of content.

Articles.Content: Just thought i'd mention this here in case it is of importance, but the Steam community hub for Kerbal seems to have had a lot of content including screenshots and artwork deleted.
Are they within the terms of service of Steam?

Are they within the terms of service of Steam?

From what i can see, just about everything apart from screenshots a day old has just vanished, thousands of entries and all the artwork gone too.
I'll try to find out what's going on, asking Skunky now.
Same seems to have happened to the Skyrim community hub, hopefully Steam will re-instate Kerbal community hub to it's previous glory.
The Age of Empires 2 workshop lost a ton of stuff too.
